structuredContent.name: BENJAMIN STEIN
structuredContent.summary: Clinical Informatics Specialist with extensive experience in IT support, system implementation, and user training within healthcare environments.

experience.title: Clinical Informatics Specialist
experience.description: Responsible for all systems and technologies used at the hospital, including implementation, maintenance, and training of web-based EHR system, enterprise web browser, and Google Enterprise. Managed administrative roles and typical tasks such as user onboarding, configuring securities, vendor communication, and troubleshooting.

experience.title: Clinical Analyst II
experience.description: Provided 24x7 IT support for clinical staff, handling hardware and OS issues, and applications associated with hospital health information systems. Managed health information integration engines and provided remote support.

experience.title: Clinical Analyst I
experience.description: Supported clinical staff with IT needs, including hardware, OS, and application issues. Managed integration engines and provided remote support.
